column1: Flow ID,Name,Description,Test Steps,Flow Priority

1,Verify Successful Purchase Flow from Product Selection to Checkout,"Navigate to the homepage, sign in, select a product, add it to the basket, proceed to checkout, fill in checkout details, confirm the order, and complete the purchase.","Step 1: Navigate to https://eco.aut.katalon.com/
Step 2: Click on link 'Sign In' -> Navigate to page 'signin'
Step 3: Login
Step 4: Click on link 'Shop' -> Navigate to page 'shop'
Step 5: Hover over div
Step 6: Click on header
Step 7: Select item, add to basket, and proceed to checkout

- Step 3: Click on div
- Step 4: Click on button 'Add To Basket'
- Step 5: Click on span
- Step 6: Click on button 'CHECK OUT'

column1: Step 8: Fill checkout details, confirm order, and complete purchase

- Step 5: Enter input value in input field
- Step 6: Click on header
- Step 7: Click on input field

- Step 9: Click on div

- Step 11: Enter input value in input field 'name'
- Step 12: Enter input value in input field 'cardnumber'
- Step 13: Enter input value in input field 'ccv'
- Step 14: Click on button 'Confirm'
